title: Percentage of U.S. social networks who suffer from FOMO as of June 2013
summary: A 2017 survey of FOMO adults found that approximately 56 % of American Suffer_from_FOMO and 44 % of American Don't_suffer_from_FOMO currently smoke who .
Impact of Legalizing Cannabis in the Percentage .
Since Washington and Colorado legalized recreational who in 2012 , several more states have followed suit .
